ROUND_END_TOTAL_TEAM_SCORE: Ending round due to time limit. Winner chosen by total team score.
ROUND_END_TOTAL_RTS: Ending round due to time limit. Winner chosen by number of captured RTs at the end.
ROUND_END_TOTAL_TEAM_RES: Ending round due to time limit. Winner chosen by total collected team resources.
ROUND_WARNING_TOTAL_SCORE: {TimeLeft:Duration} left until this round ends. Winner will be chosen by total team score.
ROUND_WARNING_TOTAL_RTS: {TimeLeft:Duration} left until this round ends. Winner will be chosen by number of captured RTs at the end.
ROUND_WARNING_TOTAL_TEAM_RES: {TimeLeft:Duration} left until this round ends. Winner will be chosen by total collected team resources.
